title: The House on Pitch Pine Crescent
description: In this Dateline classic, a Toronto family lives in fear as one relative after another is found dead over the years in the same home. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 18, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
